mapper.insert: INSERT into pet (master_id, pet_name,age,create_date, species) VALUES ( #{masterId}, #{petName}, #{age}, #{createDate}, #{species} );
mapper.select: select b.name ,b.title, b.phone,a.id, a.pet_name, a.age ,a.create_date, a.species from pet a, proprietor b where b.id = a.master_id and b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and b.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%') limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from pet a, proprietor b where b.id = a.master_id and b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and b.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%');
mapper.update: update pet set pet_name = #{petName} , age = #{age} , create_date = #{createDate} , species = #{species} where id = #{id};
